import React from 'react'; import './ProjectModal.css'; import { Slide } from 'react-slideshow-image'; import 'react-slideshow-image/dist/styles.css' import ABOUTImage from './images/ABOUT.png' import MENUImage from './images/MENU.png' import CONTACTImage from './images/CONTACT.png' import { Button, Modal } from 'react-bootstrap'; function ProjectModal(props) { const slideImages = [ ABOUTImage, MENUImage, CONTACTImage ]; const properties = { duration: 3000, transitionDuration: 500, }; return ( <>
Madtongsan Website Woohoo, you're reading this text in a modal! ) } export default ProjectModal;
